      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for the server. Starts the server (on default port of 10010 if no argument was given).
        Parameters:
        args - Only 1 optional argument is accepted for giving the server a port to run on.

      • register

        public boolean register(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String clientIP,
                        int clientServerPort)
                 throws org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException
        Registers client's username to its local server proxy so we can communicate both ways.
        Specified by:
        register in interface Chat
        Parameters:
        username - The nickname of the client.
        clientIP - The IP address of the client.
        clientServerPort - The port to which client's local server is bound to.
        Returns:
        boolean Whether the client was successfully registered on the server.
        Throws:
        org.apache.avro.AvroRemoteException

      • run

        public void run()
        This thread runs a polling function which checks for the connected users every 5 seconds.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
